text.en: Your pure channels and elements ripened as themudrāof the deity;
text.en-trans: dakpé tsa kham lha yi chakgyar min

text.en: Your speech, throughprāṇāyāma, is the indestructiblenāda;
text.en-trans: soktsol zhomdral dorjé na dé sung

text.en: And your mind, through the experience of the four joys, is co-emergent bliss.
text.en-trans: dechen lhenkyé ga zhi nyöpé tuk

text.en: Lordly Shepa Dorje, I supplicate you.
Having given up addiction toward existence, let me be freed from the shackles of the eight worldly concerns.
text.en-trans: sipar zhenlok chö gyé ching lé drol

text.en: With perfect respect, may I receive your blessings and see the guru as a buddha;
text.en-trans: mögü tsé jin lama sangye tong

text.en: And, with single-pointed accomplishment of yoga in isolated places,
May I seize the throne of the four kāyas in but a single lifetime.
text.en-trans: ku zhi tsensa tsé dir zinpar dzö

text.en: When my time comes, may I be born in your joyful buddha-field, my protector –
text.en-trans: namzhik tsé pö gön khyö gyepé zhing

text.en: The natural manifestation of the pleasant realm, Intense Joy.
text.en-trans: rangnang ngönpar gawé tsal kyé té

text.en: Then, having awakened there, may I lead all the infinite beings
text.en-trans: drel tok khakhyab yichen gyatso kün

text.en: With whom I have a connection to the state of the mighty yogin.
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk gopang gö nü shok
